modName: Dawnguard and Vampire Lord Hybrid Lord Race
summary: Werewolf and Vampire Lord. Requires Dawnguard!!
descriptionHtml:
Werewolf and Vampire Lord. Requires Dawnguard!! Become both using one race. Hybrid Lord. Gives both powers! Also adds a hideout close to whiterun!There is actually two perks I added but I have no idea how to add them to the perk tree, perhaps someone can help me? Just comment. When you become one you still have the other form. But I still have not tested it on the quest when you get those powers like Lord Harkon\'s Gift or Companions werewolf turning quest.

Q: Do I get a perk for either vamp lord or werewolf.
A: Yes, I actually made one for each that allows you to turn into the other but I do not know how to add it to the perk tree.

Q: Can I recieve extra magic effects like beast blood that makes resistant to disease?
A:No, hopefully I will add that in the future.

Q: Do I still get attacked by Lord Harkon when I become werewolf in his place or the other way around for companions?
A: I don\'t know, still haven\'t tested that yet. Hopefully that\'s because of faction system.
Maybe I will add a new faction and class. Can anyone help me? Comment.

Version 2
This time in the hideout. Right side of cage 2 there\'s a gate. It brings you to Blackreach. There you will find hybrid guards. Three types. One human form. Second vampire lord form. And third wolf form. Also there are two dragons. I used the skin of the dragon which could dive under water. WARNING!!! I have no idea if there are bugs. If u spawn werewolves the guards won\'t fight due to faction system. Other than VL\'s and werewolves, I think they\'ll fight other creatures.

Feature Plans.
I was hoping someone would help me make a quest for this mod. I do not require an advanced quest. Simple ones work out too. I will try make a model featuring werewolf with wings. Like the one in adventure quest. The character WOLFWING. I know that\'s something that gamers will crave for. Also I want to ask something. What\'s the class system in CK for? I was hoping on creating a new one called \"Hybrid Lord\".

IMPORTANTLY
If anyone has any questions or problems please comment. I feel that more comments and ideas will help expand this mod further. Of course if anyone wants it far, I will need a team.
author: Ajwad
